劃.definition: to delimit; to transfer; to assign; to plan; to draw (a line); stroke of a Chinese character

劃位.definition: (Tw) to divide up an area; to assign a spot; to allocate a seat; one's assigned spot

劃傷.definition: to damage by scratching; to gash; to lacerate

劃分.definition: to divide up; to partition; to differentiate

劃十字.definition: variant of 畫十字|画十字[hua4 shi2 zi4]

劃掉.definition: to cross out; to cross off

劃撥.definition: to assign; to allocate; to transfer (money to an account)

劃歸.definition: to incorporate; to put under (external administration)

劃清.definition: to make a clear distinction; to differentiate clearly

劃破.definition: to cut open; to rip; to streak across (lightning, meteor etc); to pierce (scream, searchlight etc)

劃等號.definition: variant of 畫等號|画等号[hua4 deng3hao4]

劃線.definition: to delineate; to draw a line; to underline

劃過.definition: (of a meteor etc) to streak across (the sky); (of a searchlight, lightning etc) to play across (the sky)

劃重點.definition: to highlight or underline an important point
